title: New Luxury Community in Katy, specials available on select units
posting_body: For leasing info call or text
Quality Meets Value in Katy, TX
At this community, you’ll find everything you want and need in your new home, and so much more.
We offer modern and spacious one and two-bedroom apartment homes that combine design and function to create the perfect space to call your new home.
Open layouts and sleek finishes give your home a stylish and comfortable feel.
Gourmet kitchens include stainless steel appliances and contemporary fixtures.
Enjoy convenient features such as in-unit washers and dryers and oversized walk-in closets.
Our community provides an expansive list of amenities, including a resort-style pool, playground, state-of-the-art fitness center, game room, and business center with co-working spaces.
Resident perks include a controlled access gates, covered parking, and 24 hour package retrieval.
Our peaceful residential setting is close enough to the big city to fully enjoy everything Houston has to offer, set in a quieter, slower-paced neighborhood.
The area is home to several beautiful parks, plenty of restaurants and retail centers, and highly rated public schools.
Resort Pool with Outdoor Grilling Station
